channel.title: Making a teleport for people who are... donators?
channel.description:
Well, I'm doing a Christmas event on my server, and I was wondering...
If someone is
[code]character-donator = 2[/code]
How would I put that in a code if there clicking on an npc to teleport to an x coord and a y coord?
I was guessing...

item.title: Making a teleport for people who are... donators?
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:2, topic:320842”]In case 155: // first Click npc

if(NPCID == #) { if(donator == 2) { teleportToX = xcoord; teleportToY = ycoord; } else { sendMessage("You need to be a donator to access this teleport."); } }[/quote]

thank you ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Making a teleport for people who are... donators?

item.title: Making a teleport for people who are... donators?

item.description:

In case 155: // first Click npc

if(NPCID == #) { if(donator == 2) { teleportToX = xcoord; teleportToY = ycoord; } else { sendMessage("You need to be a donator to access this teleport."); } }
